title: Maik Bieleke
text:
I’m a senior researcher and data scientist at the University of Konstanz, Germany. With a background in psychology and economics, my interestes include human motivation, effort, and performance in basic and applied research. I passionately use R for data science and in my general workflow.







 Back to top
